Class InputHandler

java.lang.Object
io.mygame.common.InputHandler
public class InputHandler extends Object
The InputHandler class handles user input for player movement. It listens for directional inputs and moves the player accordingly, updating the player's position and direction.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    InputHandler(Player player)
    Constructor that initializes the InputHandler with a player instance.

    Method

  • Constructor Details

    • InputHandler

      public InputHandler(Player player)
      Constructor that initializes the InputHandler with a player instance.
      Parameters:
      player - The player instance to be controlled by this InputHandler.

  • Method Details

    • moveUp

      public void moveUp()
      Moves the player up, sets direction to BACK. Increases the Y-coordinate of the player based on speed and delta time.

    • moveDown

      public void moveDown()
      Moves the player down, sets direction to FRONT. Decreases the Y-coordinate of the player based on speed and delta time.

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft()
      Moves the player left, sets direction to LEFT. Decreases the X-coordinate of the player based on speed and delta time.

    • moveRight

      public void moveRight()
      Moves the player right, sets direction to RIGHT. Increases the X-coordinate of the player based on speed and delta time.

    • moveUpRight

      public void moveUpRight()
      Moves the player diagonally up-right, sets direction to RIGHT. Moves the player along both axes at a reduced speed for diagonal movement.

    • moveUpLeft

      public void moveUpLeft()
      Moves the player diagonally up-left, sets direction to LEFT. Moves the player along both axes at a reduced speed for diagonal movement.

    • moveDownRight

      public void moveDownRight()
      Moves the player diagonally down-right, sets direction to RIGHT. Moves the player along both axes at a reduced speed for diagonal movement.

    • moveDownLeft

      public void moveDownLeft()
      Moves the player diagonally down-left, sets direction to LEFT. Moves the player along both axes at a reduced speed for diagonal movement.
